name: Advanced Evolution
author: Chaos
content: Ming He is a teenager with an inconspicuous superpower, but his superpower is the lowest one out of the five tiers, White Dust. When he was on the way home, a disaster comet with the code name “Goddess” flew into the atmosphere and crashed onto Ming He, who was riding his bike on an empty highway.“Goddess” then became a spirit and gifted a powerful super talent to Ming He. With the addition of his original “trash” talent, Ming He gradually hikes towards his goal of becoming the strongest human,
